CustomField.description: Named Fetch Tree heap size in bytes. Range: 1048576 (1MB) - 6291456 (6MB). Recommended value: 5242500 (5MB).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Value in bytes. Lower limit 1048576 (1 MB). Upper limit 6291456 (6 MB). Recommended value 5242500 (5 MB).
CustomField.label: NFT Heap Size Limit
